# selectionMode

**Instance Property**

The selection mode of the grouped toolbar item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectionMode: NSToolbarItemGroup.SelectionMode { get set }
```

## Configuring grouped toolbar items

- **controlRepresentation**: A value that represents how a toolbar displays a grouped toolbar item.
- **NSToolbarItemGroup.ControlRepresentation**
- **NSToolbarItemGroup.SelectionMode**: A value that indicates how a grouped toolbar item selects its subitems.
